alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:13PM MDT until July 01 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MADISON...SOUTHEASTERN BEAVERHEAD AND SOUTH CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 312 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles west of Clyde Park to 12 miles southwest of Livingston to 15 miles southeast of Ennis to 14 miles east of Gilmore, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lima, Monida, Dell, Big Sky, Bannack Pass, Lakeview, Cameron, Snowline and Monida Pass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
